scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Jordan Theune
scrape.text: HATED this book. As a previous reviewer mentioned, in NO circumstance would you discuss such a matter at a nice restaurant--or in public at all! These people were some sociopaths. Not one part of this book was interesting or enjoyable for me. I also particularly disliked that the narrator would talk about something but not mention specifics "because there was no need." Very annoying.
